name: Nebula's Descent
description:
BITE-SIZED, BULLET-HELL, ROGUE-LIKE, SCORE-ATTACK, TWIN-STICK!


Get into the research lab, throw black holes, try to survive, defeat the final boss, and get to the top of the leaderboards! Nebula's Descent is a game made by 8 university students over 10 weeks for the Ubisoft Game Lab competition.

Nebula's Descent features:
  • Steam Leaderboards where you can compete with your friends and the world
  • 19 rooms with 7 enemy spawn patterns each
  • Bullet Hell Gameplay
  • A Final Boss
  • Points-based continue system, allowing anyone to finish the game while rewarding successful players with better scores
  • Blackhole Grenade and Box Spawn combat abilities
  • Points-based upgrade system where you can enhance your weapon, health or abilities
  • Colorful, bright graphics with tons of particles and a unique style
  • Great Optimization.
